InvoiceDocument.name: InvoiceDocument
InvoiceDocument.description: Tracks and displays the status of documents generated for invoices. Invoice documents are available in the related lists of invoice entity records.

ContentDocumentId.description: The ID of the generated PDF document.

DateGenerated.description: The date on which the PDF is generated.

DocumentGenerationProcessId.description: The ID of the entity that contains the information used to create the PDF invoice.

DocumentNumber.description: The ID of the generated document.

ErrorMessage.description: Errors that occur during PDF generation.

InvoiceId.description: The ID of the invoice entity to which the invoice document is attached.

Status.description: The status of the PDF generation process.
